description:
The school song’s cursed, so the students have to come up with a new one! Then, Date and Sanada somehow travel back in time to Japan’s Warring States Period!
Source: HIDIVE

titles.title: And the Bell Will Ring for... Who!? / Welcome to Sengoku Basara
Ano Kane o Narasu no wa, Masaka! / Sengoku Basara e Youkoso
あの鐘を鳴らすのは, まさか! / 戦国BASARAへようこそ
